description: Order of shuffle group on n cards {0..n-1} generated by i->n-1-i and i->min{2i,2n-1-2i}.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 323.
prog: (MAGMA) S := function(n) G := Sym({0..n-1}); p := &*[ G | (i, n-1-i) : i in [ 0..Floor((n-2)/2) ] ];q := G![ Min(2*i,2*n-1-2*i):i in [ 0..n-1 ] ]; return Order(sub<G | p, q >); end function;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
